definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 7:9 lamb (NH id., lamb; Aram. [[טַלְיׇא]] lamb, youth, [[טַלְיְתָא]] girl, t.alyo0 boy, youth, t.liyto0 girl (cf. Mk 5:41 SyrVer); Ar. t.alan0 young of cloven-footed animals, esp. young gazelle Hom:NS 235, Nedj. tully, male lamb, Doughty:Arab. Desert. i. 429, ii. 269; Eth. t’ali: flock of goats, goat, kid)—[[טְלֵה חָלָב]] 1Sa 7:9 sucking lamb (for burnt-offering); in prediction [[זְאֵב וְטָלֶה יִרְעוּ]] Is 65:25 wolf & lamb shall feed; [[טְלָאִים]] pl. of foregoing, only Is 40:11 in metaph. of ´[[י]] shepherding his people.
